feed.title: Writups - cryptography
feed.subtitle: A diary dedicated to exploring the world of cybersecurity and technology.

entry.title: c4ptur3-th3-fl4g - TryHackMe Writup
entry.content:
A beginner level CTF challenge

Task 1. Translation and Shifting

1. c4n y0u c4p7u23 7h3 f149?

This is just translation, 4=a, 0=o, 7=t, 2=r, 3=e, 1=l.

2. 01101100 01100101 01110100 01110011 00100000 01110100 01110010 01111001 00100000 01110011 01101111 01101101 01100101 00100000 01100010 01101001 01101110 01100001 01110010 01111001 00100000 01101111 01110101 01110100 00100001

Here given is the combination of 1 byte, ie 8 bit. First need to convert this bytes into ASCII, and then corresponding characters.

Can be used this site to convert https://www.rapidtables.com/convert/number/binary-to-ascii.html.

3. MJQXGZJTGIQGS4ZAON2XAZLSEBRW63LNN5XCA2LOEBBVIRRHOM======

This is in base32 form so need to decode into normal form. Can be used https://www.dcode.fr/base-32-encoding.

4. RWFjaCBCYXNlNjQgZGlnaXQgcmVwcmVzZW50cyBleGFjdGx5IDYgYml0cyBvZiBkYXRhLg==

This is base64 encoded string, need to decode maybe using this site https://www.base64decode.org/.

5. 68 65 78 61 64 65 63 69 6d 61 6c 20 6f 72 20 62 61 73 65 31 36 3f

This is in hexadecimal format. Need to convert hex to ascii character, can be use this site https://www.rapidtables.com/convert/number/hex-to-ascii.html.

6. Ebgngr zr 13 cynprf!

This is in ratation form, Rot13. Can be used this site for decoding https://cryptii.com/pipes/rot13-decoder.

7. *@F DA:? >6 C:89E C@F?5 323J C:89E C@F?5 Wcf E:>6DX

This is in rot 47 format. Use this site https://www.dcode.fr/rot-47-cipher.

8. - . .-.. . -.-. --- -- -- ..- -. .. -.-. .- - .. --- -.

. -. -.-. --- -.. .. -. --.

This is the morse coding. Use https://morsecode.world/international/translator.html.

9. 85 110 112 97 99 107 32 116 104 105 115 32 66 67 68

ASCII encoding, from decimal. Use site https://www.coderstool.com/decimal-to-ascii.

10. 

This contains multiple ciphers namely

  • Cipher 1: Base64, Because there is = at last. After decoding we got morse code of format ----- .---- .----.
  • Cipher 2: Morse code, After using morse code encoding we get binary data.
  • Cipher 3: Binary to ASCII, after convering we got data like fe _``e, which is in ROt47 format
  • Cipher 4: ROT 47, we got 76 101 116 39 115 32 109 97 107 101 32 116 104 105 115 32 97 32 98 105 116 32 116 114 105 99 107 105 101 114 46 46 46, which is in binary coded decimal format.
  • Cipher 5: BCD to ASCI, finally we got the flag. This is Let's make th********************.

Task 2. Spectrograms

We downloaded the task file. As there mention, spectrogram is a visual representation of the spectrum of frequencies of a signal as it varies with time.

We can simply use audio visualization tool like audacity to make this possible.

After opening file in audacity, right click on file and change option from Waveform to Spectrogram, there we got the flag. And this is super ****** *******.

Task 3. Steganography

Steganography is the practice of concealing a file, message, image, or video within another file, message, image, or video.

Here also need to download the task file which is a jpg file and need to revel the infromation.

It seems there is a text file embeeded. Here we used the tool steghide.

steghide --info stegosteg_1559008553457.jpg
"stegosteg_1559008553457.jpg":
  format: jpeg
  capacity: 2.5 KB
Try to get information about embedded data ? (y/n) y
Enter passphrase: 
  embedded file "steganopayload2248.txt":
    size: 13.0 Byte
    encrypted: rijndael-128, cbc
    compressed: yes

From above result we can see that, passphrase is asked but this is not required so we can just ignore this. 

❯ steghide --extract -sf stegosteg_1559008553457.jpg
Enter passphrase: 
wrote extracted data to "steganopayload2248.txt".

Now we have the txt file and there is flag, Spa**********.

Task 4. Security through obscurity

Security through obscurity is the reliance in security engineering on the secrecy of the design or implementation as the main method of providing security for a system or component of a system.

There is also the file, first need to download and do all required activity.

Current filename and extension is meme_1559010886025.jpg, but we need to find out first filename and extension.

We use this command strings meme_1559010886025.jpg and got the first answer as hac*******.png at last.

One line above this line we have the message, which is AHH_YO**********!.

This Challenge provides diverse field of cryptograpic problems. Which is really good to know.

Happy Hacking !!
